Text:
wow
downloaded this as a passionate cook in hope for some tasty Russian recipes (Russian cuisine is great for winter)
this is more than just a cookbook, it's a gem for book lovers complete with a quotation from Stalin on the front page
highly recommended!
It is a legendary book, developped by the russian research institute for food! It's an authoritative source. Thanks a lot!

Would you PLEASE seed at least the following two Miriodor from your torrent for me....thanks

Artist : Miriodor
Albums :
1986 - Rencontres
1996 - Jongleries Elastiques
